title: Add an Authorized User to Account
description: A customer wants to add their spouse as an authorized user who can make changes to the account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the primary account holder's identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the identity of the person making the request.

tasks.description: Explain the permissions an authorized user will have.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates what an authorized user can and cannot do.

tasks.description: Collect the new user's information and add them to the account with the 'authorized user' role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new user to the account.
